JPO application documentation

Uses of Package
jpo

Classes in jpo used by jpo
AdvanceTimer
          This class implements a Thread waits a period of time and then calls the method requestAdvance on it's calling object.
AdvanceTimerInterface
          This interface defines what methods the implementing object must have if it wants be the receiver of AdvanceTimer events.
ApplicationMenuInterface
          This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create an ApplicationJMenuBar.
Camera
          A class which holds information about the digital camera as seen by the filesystem
ChangeWindowInterface
          This interface defines the methods that an object must implement if it wants to be able to receive requests from a ChangeWindowPopupMenu.
ChangeWindowPopupMenu
          A class that generates a popup menu for a group node.
CleverJTree
          The is one of the main classes in the JPO application as it is an extended JTree that deals with most of the logic surrounding the collection and the user interactions with it.
CleverJTreeInterface
          This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create a CleverJTree.
CollectionPropertiesJPanel
          class that presents a GUI and shows the user which files are in his collection and which are not.
CopyLocationsChangeListener
          Interface to notify that the Settings.copyLocations array has changed.
DirectoryChooser
          An object of this class displays a text field with a dropdown button to select the previously used directories and has a button next to it which allows you to bring up a filechooser.
GroupInfo
          A class which holds information about the group and has been given the intelligence of how to write itself and it's pictures to an html document.
GroupPopupInterface
          This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create a GroupPopupMenu
HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer
          Inner class that keeps a buffer of the picture descriptions and will output a table row with the buffered descriptions when the buffer has reached it's limit.
InfoPanel
          The infopanel shows interesting stuff about what has been selected.
NonFocussedCaret
          This class overrides the adjustVisibility method of the DefaultCaret class.
PictureInfo
          Objects of this type represent a single picture in the collection.
PictureInfoChangeEvent
          Objects of this class have details about what was changed in a PictureInfo object.
PictureInfoChangeListener
          This interface allows PictureInfo objects to tell other objects about changes
PicturePane
          The job of this extended JComponent is to load, scale and display a picture while providing mouse control over which area is being shown and at which magnification.
ProgressGui
          a private class that allows the PictureAdder to show what it is doing.
Query
          This class stores the parameters for a search and can return an Arraylist of the search results.
RecentDropNodeListener
          This interface allows the Settings object to notify any interested object that the array Settings.recentDropNodes has changed.
RecentOpenFileListener
          This interface allows the Settings to inform an object that the recently opened files array has changed.
ScalablePicture
          a class to load and scale an image either immediately or in a seperate thread.
ScalablePictureListener
          This interface allows an object to inform another object that the status it is listening on has changed.
SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode
          This class extends the DefaultMutableTreeNode with the Comparable Interface that allows our nodes to be compared.
SourcePicture
          a class to load and scale a picture either immediately or in a seperate thread from a URL
SourcePicture.ImageProgressListener
          Special class that allows to catch notifications about how the image reading is getting along
SourcePictureListener
          This interface allows an object to inform another object that the status it is listening on has changed.
TableMap
           
Thumbnail
          Thumbnail displays a visual representation of the specified node.
ThumbnailCreationThread
          Queue that holds requests to create Thumbnails from Highres Images
ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel
          ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel is a JPanel that displays the metadata of a thumbnail.
ThumbnailJScrollPane
          The ThumbnailJScrollPane manages a JPanel in a JScrollPane that displays a group of pictures in a grid of thumbnails or ad hoc search results..
ThumbnailJScrollPane.ThumbnailLoaderThread
          This object creates a thread which calls the methods in the ThumbnailJScrollPane object.
ThumbnailQueueRequest
          Object that holds the references to the Thumbnail and the priority with which the request was submitted
UserFunctionsChangeListener
          Interface to notify that the Settings.copyLocations array has changed.
WholeNumberField
          a clever JTextField that allows only numbers to be captured
